unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he recovers soon, we need him for the Asia Cup! And what about Pant? Dr. Sharma mentioned something about his rehab. Last I heard, he was doing light exercises in NCA, Bangalore. Heard the new stadium is around 50,000 sq ft. Hope he gets back in form soon! Rs. 10 says he'll smash it at the next R match!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he recovers soon, we need him for the Asia Cup! And what about Pant? Doctor Sharma mentioned something about his rehab. Last I heard, he was doing light exercises in N C A, Bangalore. Heard the new stadium is around fifty thousand square feet. Hope he gets back in form soon! Rupee ten says he will smash it at the next R match!
